title: Domain 1.4: Given a scenario, use the appropiate Microsoft Windows Control Panel utility.
content:
‚öôÔ∏è Microsoft Windows 10 Control Panel Utilities (Core Set)

  • Internet Options: Manage browser settings, cookies, and security zones (mainly for Internet Explorer).
  • Devices and Printers: View and manage connected hardware like printers and peripherals.
  • Programs and Features: Uninstall programs or modify Windows features.
  • Network and Sharing Center: Adjust network adapter settings and manage profiles.
  • System: See system specs, OS version, activation, and advanced system settings.
  • Windows Defender Firewall: Configure firewall settings and application rules.
  • Mail: Manage Outlook profiles and data files (shows if Outlook is installed).
  • Sound: Choose and configure audio input/output devices.
  • User Accounts: Manage user types, credentials, and UAC settings.

üß∞ Mid-Level Control Panel Utilities

  • Device Manager: Update, disable, or troubleshoot hardware components.
  • Indexing Options: Control what content Windows Search indexes for faster results.
  • Administrative Tools: Access Event Viewer, Services, Performance Monitor, and more.

üóÇÔ∏è File Explorer Options

  • Show hidden files: View normally hidden system folders.
  • Hide extensions: Toggle file extension visibility.
  • General options: Control file/folder behavior (e.g., single-click open).
  • View options: Change folder display layout and apply across all folders.

‚ö° Power Options

  • Hibernate: Saves session to disk; turns off the PC completely.
  • Power plans: Choose energy profiles like Balanced, Power Saver, or High Performance.
  • Sleep/Suspend: Keeps RAM active for quick resume.
  • Standby: Similar to Sleep (low-power mode).
  • Choose what closing the lid does: Define sleep/hibernate/shutdown behavior for laptops.
  • Turn on fast startup: Hybrid boot for faster reboots.
  • USB selective suspend: Saves power by disabling unused USB ports.

üßë‚Äçü¶Ω Ease of Access

Accessibility features for visual, auditory, or physical impairments. Includes narrator, magnifier, sticky keys, high contrast, and more.
